reciprocity; burden upon applicantSection 43-41-9 - Licensing; joint ventures treated uniquely; notification to division of changes; separation of sole qualifying agent; disciplinary actions; payment of fees; joint responsibility for work productSection 43-41-10 - Reprimand, revocation, or other corrective actions authorized; issuance of stop-work orders; adoption of rules and regulations; lifting of suspensionSection 43-41-11 - Effect of licensureSection 43-41-12 - Penalty for violating provisions; penalty for noncompliance with chapter; posting of requirementsSection 43-41-15 - Death of contractor; notifications; completion of workSection 43-41-16 - Grounds for revocation of license; authorized action by division in event of wrongdoing; interest and penalties; continuing education as requirement for resumption of standingSection 43-41-17 - Effective date of licensing and sanctioning provisions; unenforceable contracts; compliance with county or municipal requirements; exemption for DOT contractors; other exceptionsSection 43-41-18 - Certain military specialties or certifications entitle persons to obtain certain professional licenses
